languages.text: "Опять имплант барахлит. Может, масла священного плеснуть? Уж с этим я справлюсь и без надзора технопровидца".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Я слышал что тем кто усердно работает — не урежут пайку

languages.text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."
languages.original_text: "Опять имплант барахлит. Может, масла священного плеснуть? Уж с этим я справлюсь и без надзора технопровидца".

traits.locale_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an enginseer..."
"My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an enginseer..."
"My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

languages.text: 「インプラントがまた故障した。またね。多分、聖なる油を少し塗れば治るかも…自分でやるよ、機関整備師を巻き込む必要はない…」
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: 「インプラントがまた故障した。またね。多分、聖なる油を少し塗れば治るかも…自分でやるよ、機関整備師を巻き込む必要はない…」

languages.text: « Mon implant est détraqué, encore une fois. Peut-être que je pourrais réparer ça avec un peu d'huile sacrée... Je vais le faire moi-même, pas la peine d'embêter un technaugure... »
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: « Mon implant est détraqué, encore une fois. Peut-être que je pourrais réparer ça avec un peu d'huile sacrée... Je vais le faire moi-même, pas la peine d'embêter un technaugure... »

languages.text: “我的植入物出问题了，又罢工了。说不定这次加点神圣机油就能修好……我自己来就行了，没必要找技工……”
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: “我的植入物出问题了，又罢工了。说不定这次加点神圣机油就能修好……我自己来就行了，没必要找技工……”

languages.text: «Tengo el implante en las últimas. Otra vez. A lo mejor un poco de aceite sagrado me hace el apaño... Voy a intentar hacerlo yo; no hace falta llamar a un visioingeniero...».
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo el implante en las últimas. Otra vez. A lo mejor un poco de aceite sagrado me hace el apaño... Voy a intentar hacerlo yo; no hace falta llamar a un visioingeniero...».

languages.text: "Mein Implantat ist im Eimer. Schon wieder. Vielleicht hilft ein wenig heiliges Öl ... Das mache ich einfach selbst, dafür brauche ich keinen Maschinenseher ..."
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Implantat ist im Eimer. Schon wieder. Vielleicht hilft ein wenig heiliges Öl ... Das mache ich einfach selbst, dafür brauche ich keinen Maschinenseher ..."

languages.text: "İmplantım gene arıza yaptı. Belki biraz kutsal yağ işe yarar. Kendim halledeyim, Mühedyum'a lüzum yok şimdi."
languages.original_text: "My implant's on the blink. Again. Maybe a bit of sacred oil would do the trick... I'll do it myself, no need to involve an Enginseer..."

traits.locale_text: "İmplantım yanıp sönüyor. Yine. Belki biraz kutsal yağ işe yarar. Kendim hallederim, bir Mühedyum'u karıştırmaya gerek yok."
